meaning_str.bing:
n. 泥；泥浆；淤泥
abbr. (=multiuser domain)【计】多用户空间
网络. 泥巴；泥土；污泥

泥；泥土；泥浆；烂泥；淤泥；批评；污蔑；毁谤
用泥把…弄脏；用泥涂；用泥堵住

1.en: He did not want it to become frightened and struggle against the wall of rock he was building in the mud.
1.cn: 他不想让马害怕，以至于挣扎起来踢坏他在泥里建好的石壁。

2.en: She fumbled in the water, found a stone the size of her fist, pulled it from the mud.
2.cn: 她在水中笨拙地摸索着，找到了一块拳头般大小的石块，她将其从泥土中抽了出来。

3.en: BP officials and legal analysts say the company is trying to be careful to avoid letting the findings devolve into more mud-slinging.
3.cn: 来自英国石油的人士和法律分析师说，该公司正力图避免让调查报告进一步损害自身形象。

0.cn: 对不起，乔治。只是些泥而已。

1.en: Oh, dear.Mummy! We splashed daddy’s football shirt with mud.
1.cn: 噢，天哪。妈妈！我们把泥弄到爸爸的足球衫上了。

2.en: Daddy Pig has rescued the kite! Oh, dear. Everyone is covered in mud. It's only mud.
2.cn: 猪爸爸够到了树枝上的风筝！糟糕，大家身上都是泥。 大家都脏了。

3.en: It looks like a square of tin mud. Mortar is a very special kind of mud that sticks bricks together.
3.cn: 看上去像一团“噗噗”响的稀泥。砂浆这其实是一种非常特殊的泥，他能把砖块都粘在一块。

4.en: It looks like a square of tin mud. Mortar is a very special kind of mud that sticks bricks together.
4.cn: 看上去像一团“噗噗”响的稀泥。砂浆这其实是一种非常特殊的泥，他能把砖块都粘在一块。

5.en: Edith! What did you put on my desk? A mud pie.
5.cn: 伊迪丝！你把什么放我桌上了？泥巴派

6.en: It's only a patch of mud. Come on, Gertrude. You can make it. Come on, bus. You can make it. The bus is stuck in the mud. Oh bother.
6.cn: 这只是一滩泥而已。来吧，格特鲁德，你可以过去的！来吧，巴士，你也可以的！巴士陷进了泥里去了。

7.en: Oh, Daddy pig, look at the mess you're in. It's only mud.
7.cn: 噢看呐，猪爸爸，瞧瞧你身上多脏啊。

8.en: We splashed Daddy's football shirt with mud. Oh. Don't worry. We'll just wash it.
8.cn: 爸爸的足球服被我们弄脏了，上面都是泥。别担心！我们洗一下就好。

9.en: What a lot of mud. We don't want to get stuck. Maybe we should go a different way.
9.cn: 突然路上出现了一滩泥！这会让我们都陷进泥里的，或许我们换一条路吧。

10.en: I've got an idea. Grandpa Pig's train can tow me out of the mud. Good thinking, Miss Rabbit.
10.cn: 我想到有什么办法啦！猪爷爷的火车可以帮我拿出来！是个好主意兔小姐。

11.en: Oh, dear. Mummy. We splashed daddy's football shirt with mud. Oh. Don't worry. We'll just wash it.
11.cn: 噢，糟糕。妈妈！爸爸的足球服被我们弄脏了，上面都是泥。别担心！我们洗一下就好。

12.en: Sheldon. Hold on. Trying to figure out how to get the bucket so I can carry the mud past the dragon.
12.cn: 谢尔顿。等一下，我正在思考如何能拿到桶，这样我就能扛着泥土越过那条龙了。

13.en: I wouldn't have washed it, but I came off, and it was full of mud. You'll just have to do your best.
13.cn: 我本来不想洗的，但我落马了，头发上全是泥，你得尽全力了。

14.en: George, you're making the car all muddy again. I will wash the mud off. Peppa, don't use the muddy water.
14.cn: 乔治，你看你又把车子给弄脏啦！让我来把泥洗掉吧。

15.en: George, you're making the car all muddy again! I will wash the mud off. Peppa, don't use the muddy water.
15.cn: 乔治，你看你又把车子给弄脏啦！让我来把泥洗掉吧。

16.en: What? We've been through the mud, the shit, the blood. And I've saved your ass more times than I can count.
16.cn: 干嘛？我们一起风风雨雨流血流汗，我都数不清救过你多少次了。

17.en: Hi Pops! Mud and Sweet potatoes. Pops! Who is that? What? Oh, hey Buddy. How you been, old-timer? Paralyzed.
17.cn: 波普！棉花糖和甜土豆。波普！是谁？怎么了？你好啊，小巴。你还好吗，老者？瘫着啊。

18.en: They may look like honeycomb, but these mud brick blocks are used to air-dry millions of grapes into raisins.
18.cn: 这些泥砖块也许看起来像蜂窝，但是它们是用来将数以百万级的葡萄风干成葡萄干的。

19.en: I'll pass you onto the next rescue service. Hello, fire service. I'm stuck in the mud. Can you rescue me, please?
19.cn: 我帮你转给下一个救援的人吧你好，消防队我被困在泥里了，你能来救我吗?
